sht31_driver.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 
3 import rospy
4 from smbus2 import SMBusWrapper
5 
6 class SHT31:
7 
8  ##The constructor
9  # @param addr Sets the I2C device address
10  def __init__(self, addr=0x44):
11  self.address = addr ## Device address (0x44 default or 0x45)
12  self.tempuratureC = 0 ## Tempurature in celcius
13  self.tempuratureF = 0 ## Tempurature in fahrenheit
14  self.humidity = 0 ## Humidity in % RH (relative humidity)
15  self.readError = False ## Status variable for indicating a read error of the SHT31 I2C device
16 
17  ##Updates and decodes the raw sht31 sensor values and stores them into class member variables to be extracted by the getter functions.
18  # Must be run before getting sensor values.
19  def updateValues(self):
20  with SMBusWrapper(1) as bus:
21  #put sensor into signle shot mode with no clock stretching
22  try:
23  bus.write_word_data(self.address, 0x24, 0x00)
24  except Exception as e:
25  rospy.logerr("Error writting to SHT31 sensor: %s", e)
26 
27 
28  rospy.sleep(.015) #experimentally found rest time before reading values
29  with SMBusWrapper(1) as bus:
30  #read 16 bit temp and humidity with 2 CRC bytes (6 bytes)
31  numOfTries = 0
32  while(numOfTries < 4):
33  try:
34  dataBlock = bus.read_i2c_block_data(self.address, 0, 6)
35  self.readError = False
36  break
37  except Exception as e:
38  rospy.logerr("SHT31-D read error: %s", e)
39  self.readError = True
40  numOfTries+=1
41  rospy.sleep(.001)
42  #print "Retrying..."
43  if(not self.readError):
44  self.decodeMessage(dataBlock)
45  else:
46  self.decodeMessage([0,0,0,0,0,0])
47 
48  ## Get the tempurature in degrees celcius
49  # @return Tempurature in degrees celcius
50  def getTempuratureC(self):
51  return self.tempuratureC
52 
53  ## Get the tempurature in degrees fahrenheit
54  # @return Tempurature in degrees fahrenheit
55  def getTempuratureF(self):
56  return self.tempuratureF
57 
58  ## Get the humidity in % RH (relative humidity)
59  # @return Humidity in % RH
60  def getHumidity(self):
61  return self.humidity
62 
63  ## Calculate the actual data values from the raw sensor data.
64  # Stores the actual data into class member variables.
65  # @param raw data from the SHT31
66  def decodeMessage(self, msg):
67  rawTemp = (msg[0] << 8) | msg[1]
68  rawHum = (msg[3] << 8) | msg[4]
69 
70  self.humidity = 100 * (rawHum/(65535.0))
71  self.tempuratureC = -45 + 175 * (rawTemp/(65535.0))
72  self.tempuratureF = -49 + 315 * (rawTemp/(65535.0))
73
